profileAlternative.headline: Data Scientist at NeuLion
profileAlternative.summary:

Verticals:

Retailing, Hotel, Airline, B2B Marketing and Digital Marketing Agencies

The marketing paradigm has shifted and the growing trends of social media marketing and mobile marketing have redirected my physical and mental energy. I will be keeping my fingers crossed to continue to integrate my skill-set with the new marketing economy. I welcome your thought in sharing your experience with me.

educations.title: The City University of Hong Kong

given.text: Sunny brought a set of proven best practices, statistical modeling and creative ideas to his role in managing the marketing data analytics area. Every meeting with Sunny included a portion where he would show me a new marketing analytics idea to help the business. Sunny introduced the idea of including predictive profiling as part of our direct mail post-mortem analyses, and this delivered critical insights for mailing list optimization. Sunny created Conference Booking Curves for us to monitor revenue trends and be able to make quick modifications to marketing activities in order to influence the shape of the curve. Sunny has a passion for marketing data analytics and that comes through in his work. See less
